name: Emotional Baggage
description:
Made in a week for Make-A-Thing January 2018 designed around the keywords; Thwart, Blip & Kind

Thwart your opponents attempts to collect 4-of-a-kind by sabotaging them with bombs that are only evidenced by a blip (metal detector alarm). Be kind or cruel to your friends in this free-for-all party game!

Controls (Xbox Controller)

Move with Left Joystick

Grab & Release with A

How To Play

Stack 4 bags of the same kind on your baggage trolley to win.

Credits

Design/Art/Programming -Joshua Bidwell

Art - Troy Rogerson

Programming - Dylan Thomson & Dan Ackroyd

Fonts by Simon Saavedra & Brian J. Bonislawsky

Music by Kevin MacLeod
